verses.name: John 13:5
verses.text: After that he poureth water into a bason, and began to wash the disciples’ feet, and to wipe them with the towel wherewith he was girded.

verses.name: John 13:6
verses.text: Then cometh he to Simon Peter: and Peter saith unto him, Lord, dost thou wash my feet?

verses.name: John 13:7
verses.text: Jesus answered and said unto him, What I do thou knowest not now; but thou shalt know hereafter.

verses.name: John 13:8
verses.text: Peter saith unto him, Thou shalt never wash my feet. Jesus answered him, If I wash thee not, thou hast no part with me.
